features: Comfortable Design：Hard seats can be very uncomfortable and cause tailbone pressure if you have to sit for a long period.Tsumbay seat cushion is firm enough to support you and soft enough to be comfortable, will support your whole body while sitting. Each premium comfortable seat cushion is 16.9”X15.0”X2.2”, to fit a variety of seats.

High Quality Memory Foam： We understand the importance and impact of your comfort and well-being during your daily activities, whether in the office, car, or even on your wheelchair. Tsumbay Seat cushion is made of high-density comfortable memory cotton, which can provide you with maximum comfort and support while you have to sit for a long period . The bottom of the cushion is made of PU leather, which makes it look fantastic.

Multifunction：Whether as a desk chair cushion, for home office computer chair cushion, seat cushion for office chair or wheelchair seat cushion, using this memory foam chair cushion for increasing comfort. Use the soft cushion as a stadium seat cushion or make your trip more pleasant by using it as a car seat pillow, seat cushion for driving by train or an airplane seat cushion.

Portable&Easy Care：With the carry handle, the lightweight seat cushion is easier to carry and perfect for travelling. The cover is removable for easy cleaning.Just wash the cover in warm water ,you can always have the new seat cushion.

After-Sales Service：Tsumbay wants you to be absolutely happy with our seat pillow. You will get 100% customer support for this seat cushion. For better shopping experience, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

Easy Transport Handle With the carry handle,Tsumbay lightweight seat cushion goes where you go.Cars,Trains,Office,​Sporting Events,Yoga...Use it anywhere you sit so you can feel great! Easy Maintenance Just wash the cover in warm water on a gentle cycle with a cold-water rinse. Voila! A seat pillow as good as new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A fine product providing good cushioning for most chairs I expect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My job requires me to sit for looonng periods of time (5+ hours and more) and every time I would stand up my lower back and buttocks would hurt so bad. I had to find a solution and here came this wonderful seat cushion. I got the largest size they offer as my chair is quite large. This cushion instantly helped reduce my pain and fixed my posture too. The cushion is nice and thick and just feels so nice. I would compare it to sitting on your bed lol. Anyways, go buy it! You won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I've bought four...you might say I'm very satisfied THEY DO FLATTEN OUT OVER TIME
reviews.reviewText: Bought my first (smaller) one in March of last year (today is May 2). Bought my second (smaller) one in June of last year. Just bought a third (smaller) one and a large one this month. These are great.The smaller ones are used daily on plain wooden chairs and those from last year have not flattened at all as far as I can tell (structural problems and sensitive tissues). The larger one is for an upholstered chair that I need to add a bit of height to so that its leg rest isn't too high.I haven't noticed any odors with any of these nor any ridge down the middle, as some reviews state. I find the material on top to be very comfortable (I sometimes sit around in undies and appreciate the good skin feel) and I haven't noticed the seat feeling warm.I recommend them.UPDATE: The one I use constantly has flattened out to the point where I am now in search of another one. If I can't find a brand with better reviews, I will repurchase. It was really comfortable until it started to get fatigued.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ever since the beginning of the pandemic where we had to work from home, I have been trying all sorts of chairs, cushions, etc. I am like the goldilocks of chairs. I went through at the very least 4 office chairs and at least that many seat cushions. They would be okay for a little bit and then they would start to hurt my bottom. My thighs, my butt... I would practice standing up and moving around, using footrests. YOU name it I tried it. The chairs were not cheap yet I could not bring myself to buy an Aeron office chair. TOP of the line. I have one at work.Well I found them on sale for considerably less, so I bought one and then I needed a good cushion --- tried the gel ones, etc. FINALLY this one! PERFECTION. Soft and comfortable. I am in heaven.I don't care how long it lasts -- I will buy another one. After 3 years search I found what my body needed.The perfect combination. DID I mention I was in heaven??

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as comfortable as expected
reviews.reviewText: I am not thrilled with my purchase. It's just not as comfortable as expected, and now I'm looking at spending more money to find a more comfortable seat cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable and cool
reviews.reviewText: I spend several hours in front of a computer every day, and often it gets a little uncomfortable when my seat gets warm or bottomed out. So, I decided to look for an extra cushion to make it a little more comfortable. This product was at a good price when I got it and one of the cheapest, so I decided to get it.The product came in just a vacuum sealed plastic. Once the plastic is removed, the seat cushion expands to its normal form. Immediately I noticed how soft the memory foam is, it is soft enough to even use as a pillow. The fabric cover is breathable and lets air pass through efficiently. It also has a zipper to remove the foam out to easily wash the fabric cover. I’ve been using this seat cushion while gaming, and I noticed that I don’t sweat that much anymore down there. I usually take quick breaks every 30 minutes to let my skin breathe, but now I can sit longer comfortably. Even if I sit several hours, once I get up, the seat cushion expands again to its original form. Very good quality.Overall, I’m glad that I bought this seat cushion, I now can play my video games longer comfortably. The memory foam quality is excellent and can last a long time. If you are looking for more comfort in your office chair, don’t buy a new chair, just grab one of this seat cushions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft but too firm maybe?
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 91 year old client. She liked it at first but then didn’t like it. She said it was too hard. 🤷🏽‍♀️ so I ordered a different one.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is confortable, great quality, practical and easy to clean!
reviews.reviewText: The cushion foam and cover are of great quality. My husband says it’s confortable & practical. He sits on a vintage wooden office chair and the size was perfect and he finds that he is sitting in a better position when working at his desk for work for a long time. Highly recomend! 😃

reviews.reviewTitle: Ligero y con asa para cargar
reviews.reviewText: Esta super cómodo y no se resbala de ninguna superficie en donde lo uses. De fácil lavadoUn color muy neutro y combinable ñ.Adios dolor al sentarme.
Revivió mi silla de oficina. Es muy cómodo y sí ayudó bastante a pasar las horas de home office en pandemia.

reviews.reviewTitle: Se siente bien por un par de horas
reviews.reviewText: El cojín la primer vez que lo usas sientes que es la solución a esa silla pésima que tienes pero esa sensación solo dura por un par de horas y después vuelves a sentir el dolor en el trasero, como que la espuma o esponja de que está hecho se comprime super rápido.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good, but wish it was bigger
reviews.reviewText: I have an Ikea office chair that started out good and eventually went "flat" in the cushion about two years later, leaving a rather hard seat. Rather than but a whole new chair I opted for this cushion to soften things up a bit. It does the job and provides a very comfortable padding that distributes the load evenly and allows sitting at the computer for a longer period (as if that's a good thing). However, I wish it was larger to better cover the existing chair seat as it certainly looks like an add-on with about a 2" border on the perimeter of the pad that the pad does not cover on the original chair pad. Fortunately I don't have a big butt, so it doesn't affect me that much but I do think it would look better and even feel better if it fit the chair pad better. Thickness is fine and firmness is perfect.
